title: Can I re-appear for the 12th boards with biology once I've done with maths? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Yes you can add subjects to your marksheet up to 6years from the year of passing in CBSE. You may not need to study 5 subjects again, you can just add a subject. However, there are some rules regarding examinations involving practical subjects like biology, you should read them. If you face any trouble, take help from your school. Or you can give exams in 6 subjects if you have not already given 12th exams, many schools provide you with the 6subject option. You don’t have to worry about scoring less in the 6th subject, because the final result is taken on basis of best of 6.
